name: Home Trip (itch)
description:
Gameplay:

Home Trip is a multiplayer online coop game (2-4 players) which is inspired by Overcooked, GTA and Zelda Breath of the Wild. Conquer every challenge and find all the gas pump!

Story:

You and your friends went on a roadtrip when suddenly a virus forces everyone to stay home. You must now hunt for food and look for gasoil while staying inside your vehicle.

Controls: Character
Move: Arrows
Interact: E
Push furnitures: R
Driving
Move / Turn: Arrows
Exit: E
Harpoon
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left click
Exit: E

Disclaimer: The game jam is over but Home Trip is still in development. We will update the game soon to make it funnier and fix bugs.

Crédits:
  • Antoine "Hypesio" Aubin: Lead programer
  • Antoine "Taldius" Semblat: Level designer & artist
  • Aurélien Montero: Composer & sound designer
